name: Ancient Medieval Empire
description:
Ancient Medieval Empire is a strategy game with RPG elements.

Owning kingdom lands has never been an easy job. A huge number
of free castles and villages, which greatly attract the evil orcs. Manage
your army, capture new castles and fight back against enemies. You have to capture
as many castles as possible and drive away the orcs.

Features:
- Random generation of locations.
- Nice graphics.
- Enemies adaptive to game progress.
